# Expert R Solutions for Your Data.
:::

I was a pharmacist before I discovered data science. Now I use my unique skills to assist anyone from scientists to students understand data using R.

R is a programming language specialising in data analysis. It produces beautiful graphs, tables and can create live dashboards.
